Going on at MakerHQ

Events happening this week.

Check out our classes!

Introduction to Microcontrollers, 3D Printing Concepts, Printed Circuitboard Fundamentals, and many more!

Events at the space!

Open to the public! Join us for events such as the Open Hardware meetup talks, demo nights, second Saturday open house!

Come visit us!

Interested in touring our space? Visit us on Tuesdays and Thursday evenings at 6pm to see the space and learn more!
